name: Purple polka dot pocket square with hand-rolled edges
description:
Looking for a way to add a dapper dash of color to your attire? Look no further, this is it.

This pocket square is made from fine soft cotton. Its edges have been lovingly hand-rolled, to provide you with a kind of finishing rarely found even in the collections of the most luxurious brands. For example, Prada, Louis Vuitton, or Hugo Boss pocket squares are all machine sewn. Canali is the only one comparable to this delicate hand-made work. You're in for a treat!

Wear it proudly - its beautiful color, fine material, and the perfectly hand-rolled edges will definitely get noticed and earn you loads of compliments!

It is a great accessory to pair with an array of blazers, especially in the lighter shades, such as beige, gray, light blue, or white. Polka dot is an essential pattern that works well with almost anything. Purple is always a great option if your attire lacks color or diversity. You really can't go wrong with this one!

Material: 100% cotton from Japan
Dimensions: 13x13 inches

name: The essential white linen pocket square
description:
Looking for the Don Draper look? Look no further, this is it.

This pocket square is made from fine crisp white linen. Its edges have been lovingly hand-rolled, to provide you with a kind of finishing rarely found even in the collections of the most luxurious brands. Wear it proudly - its pure white color, fine material, and the perfectly hand-rolled edges will definitely get noticed and earn you loads of compliments!

It is a great accessory to pair with an array of blazers, especially in the darker shades, such as gray, navy, and black. An essential piece that is a staple in the pocket square collection of any stylish gentleman.

Material: 100% linen 
Dimensions: 13x13 inches

name: Navy pocket square with white flowers
description:
This pocket square is made from fine soft cotton. Its edges have been lovingly hand-rolled, to provide you with a kind of finishing rarely found even in the collections of the most luxurious brands. Wear it proudly - its beautiful color, pattern, and the perfectly hand-rolled edges will definitely get noticed and earn you loads of compliments!

It is a great accessory to pair with an array of blazers, especially in the lighter shades of blue, beige, gray, and materials like tweed, wool, or Corduroy. Feel free to experiment with colors, materials, try complementing your blue tones or be bold and try contrasting.. you really can't go wrong! 

Material: 100% cotton
Dimensions: 13x13 inches

name: Executive Cuff Links Three Black Stripes
description: The essential executive cuff links pair made from beautiful white stainless steel. Belongs to the same set as our Executive Tie Bar Four Black Stripes. Pair them together for a sophisticated and polished look! The cuff links come in an elegant Inori velvet bag and you'll receive a delicate cleaning cloth with it as a present. Sold through the official Inori web store, this pair costs $85 (see here, choose your country and click Accessories). Make use of this exclusive limited offer before our stock sells out!
